title: About
text: Satoshi Matsumoto is a Data Analyst and business strategist specializing in automated reporting solutions and data-driven decision-making. He develops custom Shiny apps that transform complex data into actionable insights for clients across Europe, from chemical companies to industrial manufacturers.

title: Analysis of 1 Million Sales Data
text: This was a case study using ROSSMANN public data for sales predictions.
